questionText: Which OOP concept refers to wrapping data and methods into a single unit?
Which feature of OOP allows the same method name to perform different tasks at runtime?
Which keyword is used to inherit a class in Java?
Which of the following is NOT a type of inheritance?
Which construct is mainly used to achieve multiple inheritance in Java?
Which block in exception handling is always executed?
Which thread state indicates that a thread is ready but waiting for CPU time?
In the delegation event model, which component listens and responds to events?
Which Java GUI toolkit is platform-dependent and uses heavyweight components?
Which UML diagram is mainly used to represent classes and their relationships?
Simple Interest on Rs. 5000 at 8% per annum for 2 years is:
If the simple interest on a sum is Rs. 450 for 3 years at 5% p.a., the principal is:
A sum of Rs. 1000 becomes Rs. 1210 in 2 years compounded annually. The rate of interest is:
If a product is sold for Rs. 880 at a loss of 12%, the cost price is:
Marked price is Rs. 2000 and discount is 15%. The selling price is:
If 30% of a number is 90, the number is:
The present ages of A and B are in the ratio 4:5. If A is 24 years old, B is:
The average of 6, 8, 10, 12 is:
Area of a circle of radius 7 cm (use π = 22/7) is:
Volume of a cuboid of length 5 cm, breadth 4 cm, height 3 cm is:
Number of permutations of 5 objects taken 2 at a time is:
Number of combinations of 6 objects taken 2 at a time is:
If a:b = 3:4 and b:c = 2:5, then a:c is:
Mean proportional between 4 and 25 is:
A bag has 5 red and 3 blue balls. Probability of drawing a red ball is:

Ordering of Words: Arrange the parts to form a meaningful sentence.
P: because it was raining
Q: we stayed indoors
R: all day
S: yesterday
Choose the correct order:

Ordering of Words: Arrange the parts to form a meaningful sentence.
P: to the manager
Q: the employee
R: about the issue
S: complained
Choose the correct order:
Sentence Improvement: The teacher insisted that he should do the work himself.
options: insisted that he do the work himself
insisted that he did the work himself
insisted that he will do the work himself

questionText: Sentence Improvement: He is good in Mathematics.

Ordering of Sentences: S1 and S5 are fixed. Arrange P, Q, R, S.
S1: The alarm rang at 6 a.m.
P: so I hurried to the bus stop.
Q: but the bus had already left.
R: I got ready quickly,
S: I missed it by just a minute.
S5: I reached the office late.
Choose the correct order of P, Q, R, S:

Ordering of Sentences: S1 and S5 are fixed. Arrange P, Q, R, S.
S1: Reading regularly improves vocabulary.
P: and it also enhances comprehension.
Q: because you encounter new words in context.
R: This habit builds confidence in communication,
S: over time.
S5: It is one of the best ways to learn a language.
Choose the correct order of P, Q, R, S:

Spotting Errors: Identify the part with an error.
A. She is one of the
B. best player in the team
C. and plays very well.
D. No error

Spotting Errors: Identify the part with an error.
A. Each of the students
B. have submitted
C. their assignments.
D. No error

Change of Speech: Convert to indirect speech.
Direct: He said, "I am working on this project."
options: He said that he is working on that project.
He said that he was working on that project.
He said that I was working on this project.
He said that he will be working on that project.

questionText:
Change of Speech: Convert to direct speech.
Indirect: She asked me if I had finished my homework.
options: She said, "Have you finished your homework?"
She said, "Did I finish my homework?"
She asked, "Do you finished your homework?"
She said, "Had you finished my homework?"

questionText: Verbal Analogies: DOCTOR : HOSPITAL :: TEACHER : ?
Verbal Analogies: BIRD : FLOCK :: FISH : ?

Spotting Errors: Identify the part with an error.
A. He is senior
B. than me
C. in this department.
D. No error
Sentence Improvement: The reason why he was late is because of traffic.
options: The reason he was late is because of traffic.
The reason why he was late is that of traffic.
The reason he was late was traffic.

questionText:
Ordering of Words: Arrange the parts to form a meaningful sentence.
P: to the market
Q: every morning
R: the old man
S: walked slowly
